price: Ntibazigera bayemera kugeza igihe bazabonera ibihano bibabaza,
arabic: لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَلِيمَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: lā yu'minūna bihi ḥattā yarawū al-ʿadhāba al-alīma
